subject: Compatibility Question
description_text:
Hello,


I am interested in purchasing the Simsonn GT2 S1 wheel and I currently use
a Fanatec CSL DD base. I would like to install this wheel using a quick
release system. Could you please confirm whether this setup is compatible?


Thank you in advance for your response.


Kind regards,

Lorenzo Pajot

conversations.body_text: Hi Lorenzo Pajot,     Our quick-release system supports a 70 mm hole spacing.
